SELECT DISTINCT a.product_id productId, a.nm_kor nmKor, a.nm_eng nmEng, a.price, a.pic, a.promotion, a.beginner, b.sale, b.sale_price salePrice, b.sale_yn saleYn FROM t_product a INNER JOIN t_sale b ON a.product_id = b.product_id INNER JOIN t_wine_pairing c ON c.product_id = a.product_id INNER JOIN t_small_category d ON c.small_category_id = d.small_category_id
and a.category_id = #{categoryId}
AND d.big_category_id = #{bigCategoryId}
AND a.country_id = #{countryId}
AND a.price < 20000
AND a.price >= 20000 AND a.price < 50000
AND price >= 50000 AND price < 100000
AND a.price >= 100000
AND a.nm_kor LIKE CONCAT('%', #{text}, '%')
GROUP BY a.product_id
ORDER BY a.product_id DESC
ORDER BY a.price DESC
ORDER BY a.price
LIMIT #{startIdx}, #{row}
